description:
Jack Rakan is a former member of Ala Rubra and an old friend(and rival) of Nagi Springfield. Now, he is a very mercantile bounty hunter known by the name "Rakan of the Thousand Blades" who charges millions for his services.
A former slave gladiator, Having earned his freedom and fame with bloody sweat (and tons of it), he is an ultimate example of a hard-working guy.
name: Jack Rakan
